fields.label: Education ID
fields.description: Education ID. If no value is provided, a new education will be created. If a value is passed in and a corresponding education is not found a new education will be created with the provided id.

metadata.description: Education ID. If no value is provided, a new education will be created. If a value is passed in and a corresponding education is not found a new education will be created with the provided id.

fields.label: Country Reference ID
fields.description: The Reference of the Country in which the school is located. If the Country Reference and School Name matches an entry from the Schools report, this reference will not be set; a School Reference will be used instead.

metadata.description: The Reference of the Country in which the school is located. If the Country Reference and School Name matches an entry from the Schools report, this reference will not be set; a School Reference will be used instead.

fields.label: Country Reference ID Type
fields.description: The Reference of the Country in which the school is located. If the Country Reference and School Name matches an entry from the Schools report, this reference will not be set; a School Reference will be used instead.

metadata.description: The Reference of the Country in which the school is located. If the Country Reference and School Name matches an entry from the Schools report, this reference will not be set; a School Reference will be used instead.

fields.label: School Reference ID
fields.description: The Reference of the School where the education was received. The Schools report returns all of the schools that can be referenced.

metadata.comments: Mapping document from legacy to WD
metadata.description: The Reference of the School where the education was received. The Schools report returns all of the schools that can be referenced.

fields.description: The Reference of the School where the education was received. The Schools report returns all of the schools that can be referenced.

metadata.description: The Reference of the School where the education was received. The Schools report returns all of the schools that can be referenced.

fields.label: School Name
fields.description: The name of the education institution.

metadata.description: The name of the education institution.

metadata.comments: Mapping document from legacy to WD

fields.label: Degree Completed Reference ID
fields.description: Indicates whether the degree was received.

metadata.description: Indicates whether the degree was received.

fields.label: Date Degree Received
fields.description: The date on which the degree was awarded.

metadata.description: The date on which the degree was awarded.

metadata.comments: Mapping document from legacy to WD

fields.label: First Year Attended
fields.description: The first year of attendance. This field should be in YYYY-MM-DD format, however the month and day will be ignored.

metadata.comments: First year attended. Required if Last_Year_Attended has a date.
metadata.description: The first year of attendance. This field should be in YYYY-MM-DD format, however the month and day will be ignored.

fields.label: Last Year Attended
fields.description: The last year of attendance. Should be displayed in YYYY-MM-DD format, but the month and day will be ignored.

metadata.description: The last year of attendance. Should be displayed in YYYY-MM-DD format, but the month and day will be ignored.

fields.label: Is Highest Level of Education
fields.description: Indicates whether this is the worker's highest level of education. Degrees are ranked using Qualification Rating Value. If a worker has two or more equivalent degrees, the most recent one is considered highest.

metadata.description: Indicates whether this is the worker's highest level of education. Degrees are ranked using Qualification Rating Value. If a worker has two or more equivalent degrees, the most recent one is considered highest.

fields.label: First Day Attended
fields.description: The first date of attendance using day month year precision. Note this can only be populated when the Education is for a Worker in a Country that has been configured to 'Use Date with Day Precision for Education' on Tenant Setup - Global.

metadata.description: The first date of attendance using day month year precision. Note this can only be populated when the Education is for a Worker in a Country that has been configured to 'Use Date with Day Precision for Education' on Tenant Setup - Global.

fields.label: Last Day Attended
fields.description: The last date of attendance using day month year precision. Note this can only be populated when the Education is for a Worker in a Country that has been configured to 'Use Date with Day Precision for Education' on Tenant Setup - Global.

metadata.description: The last date of attendance using day month year precision. Note this can only be populated when the Education is for a Worker in a Country that has been configured to 'Use Date with Day Precision for Education' on Tenant Setup - Global.

name: Manage Goals
description: {"Population Scope / Selection Criteria": null, "Notes": null, "PRIMARY TABLE": null, "SECONDARY TABLES": null, "JOIN LOGIC": null, "WHERE LOGIC": null, "REFERENCE TYPES": null, "MANUAL CODE TO RUN AFTER": null, "MANUAL CODE TO RUN PRIOR": null, "DECLARED VALUES": "@conversionDate = ''", "WEB SERVICE": "Manage_Goals", "STANDARD SP": null, "API VERSION": null}

fields.label: Worker Reference ID
fields.description: The Worker commenting on the Goal.

metadata.description: The Worker commenting on the Goal.

fields.label: Worker Reference ID Type
fields.description: The Worker commenting on the Goal.

metadata.description: The Worker commenting on the Goal.

fields.label: Goal ID
fields.description: The Goal reference for this goal detail.

metadata.description: The Goal reference for this goal detail.

fields.label: Goal Name
fields.description: The Goal Name is required since it is the primary identification for the Goal.

metadata.sample_value: <p style="text-align: LEFT;"><span style="font-size:12px;"><span style="color: #000000;font-family: Arial;">Improve payroll processing accuracy</span></span></p>
metadata.description: The Goal Name is required since it is the primary identification for the Goal.

fields.label: Goal Description
fields.description: The optional long description of the Goal.

metadata.sample_value: <p style="text-align: LEFT;"><span style="font-size:12px;"><span style="color: #000000;font-family: Arial;">Reduce the number of off-cycle paychecks caused by erroneous data entry.</span></span></p>
metadata.description: The optional long description of the Goal.

fields.label: Goal Category Reference ID
fields.description: The optional set of Goal Categories for this Goal. The Reference ID can be set with the type Goal_Category_ID.

metadata.description: The optional set of Goal Categories for this Goal. The Reference ID can be set with the type Goal_Category_ID.

fields.label: Due Date
fields.description: The date the Goal is due to be completed.

metadata.description: The date the Goal is due to be completed.

fields.label: Status Reference ID
fields.description: The optional Completion Status you can use to indicate if the Goal is, for example, In Process or Completed. The Reference ID can be set using the type Component_Completion_ID.

metadata.description: The optional Completion Status you can use to indicate if the Goal is, for example, In Process or Completed. The Reference ID can be set using the type Component_Completion_ID.

fields.label: Completion Date
fields.description: The date the Goal was actually completed.

metadata.description: The date the Goal was actually completed.

fields.label: Comment Text
fields.description: The Comment Text that you can add to a Goal.

metadata.sample_value: You had some nice results on this goal and I think it would benefit all the other regions if you were able to share what you did to achieve this.
metadata.description: The Comment Text that you can add to a Goal.
